thread.title: This 50-year-old farmer is ripped
thread.title_full: This 50-year-old farmer is ripped | New York Post

author: Alexandra Klausner
title: This 50-year-old farmer is ripped
text:
This 50-year-old farmer from North Carolina looks incredible in a crop top.
Jennifer King — who goes by Farm Girl Jen online — gets fit by flipping tractor tires and performing sledge hammer swings for her 155,000 fans.
The mature model earns $100,000 a year through her YouTube channel Banshee Moon and has been posting videos with her husband, Jason, since 2012.
“I never imagined I would become a social media star at this age,” King told Caters.
“It’s funny that this all started with my husband making a few videos of what I do for fun and I am flabbergasted at how much the whole thing has just kind of exploded,” she added.
King credits her rock-hard abs and online success to “being older and wiser” and says she only started seriously weightlifting in her 40s.
“I did some weightlifting starting in my mid-, late 20s but didn’t get serious about the weights until just about eight years ago when I started doing Crossfit where we did a lot of Olympic lifting, and then about four years ago I added a strength program to my regimen,” King told Caters.
King eats a healthy diet of fish, vegetables and some other meats — but avoids processed foods. She believes a healthy lifestyle is the key to happiness.
“I feel that a healthy lifestyle can cure all manner of physical and mental ailments,” King said.
